summary:
## Rosetta Stone: Unlocking Ancient Egypt

The Rosetta Stone is a really old rock with writing on it from 196 BC Egypt. It has the same message written three times in different languages: hieroglyphs, Demotic, and Ancient Greek. This was super helpful for figuring out how to read hieroglyphs, which no one could do for a long time.

Found in 1799, the stone helped scholars understand Ancient Egyptian history and culture. Even though there are other similar stones now, the Rosetta Stone was the first and most important key to unlocking this ancient language.
title: Rosetta Stone
